sources.title: The Vanishing Shadow (1934) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Onslow Stevens, James Durkin, Ada Ince
Directed by: Lew Landers

An electrical engineer teams up with a fellow scientist to avenge his father‚Äôs death at the hands of corrupt, money-making politicians. On their crusade, they develop a variety of complex devices‚Äîray guns, Robots, and a Vanishing Belt that leaves only the user‚Äôs shadow visible. But the arrival of a beautiful reporter complicates their plans. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:27       CHAPTER 1:  Accused of Murder 
22:28     CHAPTER 2:  The Destroying Ray
42:46     CHAPTER 3:  The Avalanche
1:03:25  CHAPTER 4:  Trapped
1:23:41  CHAPTER 5:  Hurled from the Sky
1:42:17  CHAPTER 6:  Chain Lightning
2:03:03  CHAPTER 7:  The Tragic Crash
2:22:57  CHAPTER 8:  The Shadow of Death
2:42:47  CHAPTER 9:  Blazing Bulkheads 
3:03:47  CHAPTER 10:  The Iron Death
3:23:32  CHAPTER 11:  The Juggernaut
3:42:18  CHAPTER 13:  Retribution
4:02:48 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A 12-episode serial in which a son avenges the death of his father at the hands of corrupt politicians. He develops a wide variety of complex devices in his crusade . . . ray guns, robots and a 'vanishing belt.'
metadata.Writer: Basil Dickey, George Morgan, Ella O'Neill
metadata.Actors: Onslow Stevens, Ada Ince, Walter Miller
